name: Polygon: DROPPED INTO HELL
description:
GAME IS IN EARLY ACCESS AND IS A PROTOTYPE

Currently being developed by 1 person as other team member is busy overseas.

Description:

Part of a crack team of operatives- you're sent in to clear the horde of zombies in populated areas of Spoonerville (a sprawling city with farms, industrial areas, residential zones, commercial areas, secret bases, and more) Fight your way through hordes of undead, save hostages by getting them to the extraction point, complete waves of zombies that increase to amounts off 300+ on screen. Survive- get the highest score you can- cause some explosions- move on to next area.

________________________________________________________________________________________

Called in to clear a town in a zombie apocalypse quarantine and save the hostages. 

  • Survive!
  • Collect Ammo!
  • Kill Hordes of Zombies
  • Save Hostages by getting them to the Extraction Zone
  • Lure Z's to explosives and light them up for a big combo!

KNOWN BUGS:

Issue with Hostage following player- animation fix on the way, currently tposes while following.

Zombies need work to make the Ai smarter, currently just directly follow player.

Grenades sometimes don't detect a hit and sometimes fall thru Earth.

Invisible walls set up to keep player in bounds, will open up the map with more content in further update.
